contentList.content: Shoot a thin ray from your finger. If the [1] reduces the target to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash.
The spellcaster can activate the arc linking it to this creature to automatically deal [1] damage.
When the wearer has less than full health, they have an additional bonus action.
<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> that cost an action cost a bonus action instead. This effect can be used once per battle.
During combat, when the creature starts their turn with less than full health, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Set yourself on fire to gain Heat. This damage can't be resisted out of combat.
When the wielder has less than full health, they deal an additional [1].
The wearer gains a +[1] bonus to Ranged <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attack Rolls</LSTag> and a +[2] bonus to Melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> until death.
Has earned Shar's approval through their charming nature. Has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> until death.
Has earned Shar's approval through an impressive display of wit. Has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> until death.
Has earned Shar's approval through a demonstration of their good sense. Has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> until death.
